segments.text: There are two children near the cabinets, and they seem to be up to something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on a stool, trying to reach a cookie jar on the top shelf.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, like it could tip over any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how reckless he's being, he could really hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, looking up at him with her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to be waiting for him to give her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they think they can get away with this without the woman noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still by the sink, completely unaware of what's happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I should say something, but I don't want to interfere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is making me feel a bit uneasy, like something bad is about to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
